overview: Arik Waldman is a co-founder and the CEO of TekTrak, a mobile security company based in Los Angeles, CA. Arik founded TekTrak along with Luka Sklizovic and Dan Russ during their MBA studies at UCLA Anderson. Prior to TekTrak, Arik served in the Israeli Defense Forces. Arik was a Team Manager at the largest consulting firm in Israel, BDO Consulting. His consulting experience (mostly with high-tech companies) includes strategy, corporate finance, market research, financial instruments and more. Arik had accompanied start-up companies from seed stage into successful IPOs. Arik has a B.A. in Business Economics from UCLA and an MBA from UCLA Anderson School of Management.
